messages.message: I think I found your wallet at the coffee shop. It matches your description.
Is the umbrella you found black with a wooden handle? I lost one like that.
Thank you for finding my keys! When can we meet so I can pick them up?

notifications.title: Potential Match Found
notifications.description: Someone reported finding a wallet that matches your lost item description.

notifications.title: New Message
notifications.description: You have a new message about your found umbrella.

notifications.title: Item Resolved
notifications.description: Your lost keys listing has been marked as resolved.

users.name: Sarah Johnson
users.bio: Community volunteer and lost item detective! I've been helping people reunite with their belongings for over a year. My specialties include finding lost jewelry, electronics, and pet accessories. When I'm not on the hunt for lost items, I enjoy yoga, cooking, and exploring local farmers markets.

users.name: Michael Chen
users.bio: Tech enthusiast and amateur photographer who stumbled into the world of lost and found. I have a knack for tracking down lost electronics and cameras. My background in IT helps me understand the value of digital memories stored in devices. Always happy to help fellow community members!

users.name: Emma Rodriguez
users.bio: Recent graduate student who discovered this amazing community through losing my own keys! Since then, I've made it my mission to help others avoid the stress I felt. I'm particularly good at finding items in university areas and public transportation spots.
